headlines.description: Bournemouth's hopes of avoiding relegation from the Premier League suffered a blow after their poor form continued with a 4-1 loss to Newcastle.
Arsenal moved into seventh place in the Premier League with a 4-0 home victory over Norwich City on Wednesday.

video.headline: Olley: Arsenal's margin for error is virtually nil

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL Analysis (Olley: Arsenal’s margin for error is virtually nil) 20200630 GLOBAL

headlines.shortLinkText: Arsenal seventh with comfy win over Norwich

headlines.description: Third-placed Leicester City's winless run since the restart of the Premier League season continued with a 2-1 defeat by Everton at Goodison Park.
headlines.shortLinkText: Leicester's winless restart continues with loss at Everton

headlines.description: Despite a brace by Willian, Chelsea gave up a late goal as West Ham were able to beat their London rivals in an entertaining 3-2 victory.

video.headline: 'Stupid Chelsea' on display against West Ham

tracking.trackingName: INE_SOC EPL FCTV ('Stupid Chelsea' on display against West Ham) 2020/7/1 Global

headlines.shortLinkText: Despite Willian brace, West Ham score late to stun Chelsea
